sub_title: Chief Technology Officer at dGB Earth Sciences
summary:
Chief Technology Officer of dGB Earth Sciences. Over 15 years' experience in the geosciences industry, including seismic reservoir characterization, AVO modelling and well modelling. I am responsible for the management of dGB's services-based operations and customized studies worldwide and the training of seismic interpreters on dGB's open source software OpendTect.

Area of expertise: North Sea, Africa and Middle East, Americas.

Technical background:
Geoscientist for dGB Earth Sciences since 2004: Rock properties predictions, well simulations, impedance inversions, and AVO studies. Wrote several papers on reservoir characterization, HitCube inversion.

Specialties: Reservoir characterization, well modelling.
Acoustic and elastic impedance: pre- and post-stack inversion
Neural network rock property predictions
Grid and volume-based Facies classification
Attribute analysis
Data enhancement/filtering
Mapping and interpretation of seismic chimneys for charge and seal-risk analysis

Software packages: OpendTect, H&R, Matlab, Scilab
Programming languages: C++, Java, python, jython, HTML
